actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To change the deadline for income tax returns for calendar year taxpayers from the 15th of April to the first Monday in November.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to change the income tax filing deadline for calendar year taxpayers from April 15 to the first Monday in November.

titles.title: To change the deadline for income tax returns for calendar year taxpayers from the 15th of April to the first Monday in November.
